entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 4. POP 40%

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm.
